name: Shmupsy
description:
Shmupsy is an animated side-scrolling shooter game with a style of a flipbook. Shoot pesky enemies and dodge their attacks! You only get one shot! Luckily, there are shield power-ups that can protect you. Beat your high score, survive the stampede, and get ready to take flight!

Arrow Keys - move

X - shoot

This is my first game ever published so its not completely perfect and its still in development. Feel free to feedback!
